channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Russell Sage Dining Hall to Relocate Cashier Station
item.description: Coming Soon! The cashier station for Russell Sage Dining Hall will be relocated to the East entrance of the building. This entrance will also be the designated exit point for leaving Russell Sage Dining Hall. Please note that Simply To Go will continue to be accessed through the West entrance.
item.author: Students

item.title: Volunteer With Unity House of Troy!
item.description: The CCPD invites students to volunteer with Unity House of Troy as they prepare for their annual Thanksgiving Food Drive. This is a great opportunity to give back to our local community, support families in need, and represent RPI. Unity House is seeking volunteers on the following days: Friday, 11/21: 9AM-4PM, Monday, 11/24: 11AM–4PM, and Tuesday, 11/25: 9AM–12PM. Register in Handshake and email Dean Burke (burked5@rpi.edu) to indicate which date(s) and time(s) you are available to volunteer.
item.author: Students

item.title: Introducing the Library’s New Virtual Service Desk!
item.description: Need help but can’t make it to the library? Our Access Services team is now available online through the Virtual Service Desk seven days a week. Whether you’re looking for help searching for an item, accessing your library account to renew books, or reserving group study rooms, you can now chat directly with our staff in real time—no matter where you are. Get the same support you’d receive at the service desk, right from your laptop or phone.
item.author: Students

item.title: Student Pantry - Thanksgiving hours
item.description: Date: Friday, November 21, 2025 11:00 AM - The pantry will be open normal Tuesday (1-4pm) and Wednesday (9am - noon) hours during the break. It will be closed Friday November 28th.
item.author: Students

item.title: Early Black Friday Sale (11/17-11/21) at Collegiate Store
item.description: The Early Black Friday Sale runs from Monday, Nov 17 until Friday, Nov 21 at the Rensselaer Collegiate Store. Available both In-store and Online (rensselaerstore.com), enjoy up to 25% Off select apparel brands including Campus United, Colosseum, Concept Sports, Nike, Zephyr and ZooZatz. Online orders $75+ get free shipping. Some restrictions may apply. See store for details. We are located on the Lower Level of the Rensselaer Student Union. Open from 10am-6pm, Mon - Fri and 11am-3pm on Sat.
item.author: Community

item.title: Computer Science Colloquia -: James Riley Inventor of VibroGuide a tactical guidance for blind athletes | Nov. 20
item.description: Date: Thursday, November 20, 2025 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM - James Riley is the inventor of VibroGuide, a tactical guidance for blind athletes. VibroGuide seeks to enhance guide/blind athlete navigation by mixing Bluetooth Direction Finding and tactile technologies. We would like to demonstrate how it provides a wireless and near-silent connection between guide and blind athlete with a tactile interface to the torso. We would invite sharing of ideas on mixing Soundscape navigation with a similar…
item.author: Community

item.title: RPI Holiday Concert and Victorian Stroll Kickoff | Dec. 6 (Registration Required)
item.description: Date: Saturday, December 6, 2025 7:00 PM - 8:30 PM - Presented in partnership with the Rensselaer County Regional Chamber of Commerce, this free, family-friendly event invites you to celebrate the season with music, community, and festive refreshments. The concert will feature performances by the RPI Orchestra, Concert Choir, and Wind Symphony, with works by Smetana, Tchaikovsky, Gershwin, Lauridsen, and Saint-Saëns. Registration is required:
item.author: Community

item.title: Conversation with Mr. Vito Paladino, President & CEO Volkswagen Canada, President Audi Canada
item.description:
Mr. Vito Paladino, President & CEO Volkswagen Canada, President Audi Canada will be in Prof. Shyam Kumar’s Strategy & Policy class at 10:45 on Friday, 11/21 for about an hour via Microsoft Teams. He will talk about the challenges facing the auto industry, and the Audi/VW group’s strategy to compete in this environment. Teams Meeting ID: Meeting ID: 247 503 103 419 84 Passcode: Ti2Zz6sv

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
